channel.title: java.net.SocketException: Connection reset - Port Forwarding
channel.description:
Hey guys I have been coding my Server for a few days now. I decided it was time to put it online as before i was using local host (127.0.0.1) I have run servers Via dedicated Servers with no problem So. I Began to Port Forward.
Temp Address : 10.0.0.4:43594 Port: unspecified:43594 Prot: tcp State: UP
I am using a
Thompson , Alcatel 510 : 0501
So i log into My server using my No-ip and i get This message
Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6)
I have attempted Logging in Via a remote Computer Not connected to my Network, And i still get
Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6)
Any help would Be Awesome. Thanks - Matt[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2008, 02:37:50 pm[/size][hr]Bump, Don't want to be forgotten [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2008, 01:13:55 pm[/size][hr]Ok guys Still need help :(

item.title: java.net.SocketException: Connection reset - Port Forwarding
item.dc:creator: @Jerwoodz Jerwoodz
item.description:
@Jerwoodz wrote:

Hey guys
I have been coding my Server for a few days now. I decided it was time to put it online as before i was using local host (127.0.0.1)
I have run servers Via dedicated Servers with no problem
So.
I Began to Port Forward.

Temp

Address :
10.0.0.4:43594

Port:
unspecified:43594

Prot:
tcp

State:
UP

I am using a

Thompson , Alcatel 510 : 0501

So i log into My server using my No-ip and i get This message

Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6)

I have attempted Logging in Via a remote Computer Not connected to my Network, And i still get

Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6) Connection from 10.0.0.6:4963 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8211) at client.run(client.java:16471) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (10.0.0.6)

Any help would Be Awesome.

Thanks
